question: Which organisation launched a platform for its clients named ‘StAR MF Plus’?
option4: Pension Fund Regulatory and Development Authority
explanation:
Asia’s oldest stock exchange, the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) has recently launched a premium platform for distributors and their clients.
Named ‘StAR MF Plus’, the digital platform will provide both front office, and back office support along with order management and analytics. It also enables distributors to perform e-KYC and customer portfolio management. BSE already houses a mutual fund distribution platform ‘StAR MF’.
